### HealthCheckPlusBackGroundOptions.Idle property
</br>


#### Gets or sets the idle after try execute HealthChecks on background service. The default value is 1 seconds.

```csharp
public TimeSpan Idle { get; set; }
```

### Remarks

The `Idle` cannot be set to a value lower than 1 second.
